entry.title: Europeโs moment for building peace in the South Caucasus

media:group.media:title: Europeโs moment for building peace in the South Caucasus
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Marat Terterov, co-founder of the Brussels Energy Club and the European Geopolitical Forum, discusses the current situation of the European Unionโs relations with the South Caucasian countries- Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia. He also explains his vision for regional cooperation in the South Caucasus, and the steps needed to discourage conflict and foster stability.

media:group.media:title: Why Armenia must electrify #shorts
media:group.media:description:
With around 80% of its total primary energy supply dependent on imports, Armenia faces a critical challenge in securing its energy future, making efficiency and diversification central to its strategy. An extensive electrification program could address this issue.

ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีธึีทีกีคึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีธึีด ีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีธีพ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีพีธีฒ ยซีีกีถึึ ีฃีธึีฟ ีดีฅีคีซีกีดีซีปีกีพีกีตึยป ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีถ ีง: ิปีีถีน ีญีถีคีซึ ีง ึีธึีฑีธึีด ีฌีธึีฎีฅีฌ ีกีตีค ีฏีกีผีธึีตึีจ, ึ ีกึีคีตีธึ ีกีตีถ ีนีซี ีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีด ีดีฅีคีซีกีตีซ ีกีถีฏีกีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจี ีฐีกีฟีฏีกีบีฅีฝ 2026 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีจีถีฟึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีกีผีกีปึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฐีกึึีฅึีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีฅีฉีฅึีธึีด ึีถีถีกึีฏีฅีฌ ีฅีถึ ิตึึีกีถีซ ีดีกีดีธึีฌีซ ีกีฏีธึีดีขีซ ีบีกีฟีพีกีพีธึ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฒีธึีซีฝ ีีกีพีกีฝีกึีคีตีกีถีซ ึ ีีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฐีฅีผีกึีฑีกีฏีธีฒีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีซ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีกีถีคีกีด, ีกีตีฝ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏีกีพีธึ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีซีน ีีกีฐีกีฃีถ ินึีธีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ
